alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 10:47PM AKST until January 14 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow has begun and will continue into the weekend across the northern panhandle. Snowfall rates will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend as well. Snow has started dry and fluffy but may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm through the weekend. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Twelve hour snow rates of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow rates will be Saturday night before snow starts to mix with rain early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
